summary:
Very simple .esp that adds 0.001 weight to gold coins in the game. So 1000 coins will be 1 weight in carry weight.

I hope you enjoy the mod, if people want to I can make other values.

Have fun
Spphy
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Coin Replacer Redux patch added!

Very simple .esp that adds 0.001 weight to gold coins in the game. So 1000 coins will be 1 weight in carry weight.

THE WEIGHT WILL NOT SHOW UP ON THE GOLD IN THE INVENTORY. The weight will be added to your carry weight BUT it will not show in the inventory weight counter.

It SHOULD be compatible with gold coin replacer mods as long as my mod is placed after the replacer in the load order. Otherwise load order shouldn't matter.

Recommendations to go with this mod:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9994//?]Als Treasure Vault by AlCiao[/url]

OR

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36940//?]Hjerim Dynamic Vault by mikom31[/url]

OR my new mod:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46888]Lakeview Treasure Vault[/url]

Now you have a place to stockpile the tons and tons of gold!

CONFLICTS:
None yet.

REQUIREMENTS:
Skyrim. (duuh :P )

INSTALLATION:
With NMM:
1) Download with manager
2) Activate with manager
Done!

Manual:
1) Download the archive/.rar file manually.
2) Open said archive with winrar/7zip or likewise programs
3) Take the file in the folder and put it in your skyrim/data folder
4) Activate the plugin with your skyrim launcher or mod manager

MO/Wrye bash users:
I expect you know how to download mods and handle this mod on your own - it is a simple .esp file.

I hope you enjoy the mod, more versions might be coming.

Have fun
Spphy

PERMISSIONS:
If you want to include my mod in your mod or use it other ways you need my permission to do so. Just ask, I just want to know the reason.

Credits:
MOTOSXORPIO - for learning me to use tes5edit to begin with.
author: Spphy
